entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
